ABOUT_SCREEN_INTRO: We are a small team of rizq that are concerned with app technology for our nation. We are startup that dreams rezkis in growth for our nation economics
ABOUT_SCREEN_PRIVACY_BODY: All data provided in the app will never be sold or shared to any companies and we don't track what you do in the app
ABOUT_SCREEN_ETHIC_BODY: We don't exploit psychological vulnerabilities like bottomless feeds or auto-play to keep users from leaving
ABOUT_SCREEN_OPEN_SOURCE_BODY: Everyone will be able to add content to the app, verify billings models and fix any incorrect information
SUPPORT_US_SCREEN_WHY_DONATE_TITLE: Why you should consider supporting us
SUPPORT_US_SCREEN_WHY_DONATE_CONTENT: MyRizq.Nasional is startup project tender propose for government, we have only a small that need support and we keep working a lot on the project even if we are not financially sustainable. Besides that, we have many costs such as servers, domain name, softwares licences, apple developer account etc.
SUPPORT_US_SCREEN_TITLE_CONSIDER_DONATE: If you like this project, please consider donating a small amount to help us keep going!
SUPPORT_US_SCREEN_PLATFORM: You can do so on Ko-fi.
MY_LOCATION_SCREEN_INTRO: Please select a country in order to improve billings calculations for streaming and electricity.
NOTIFICATIONS_SCREEN_INTRO: Receive a notification every Sunday at 9 p.m to remind you to add your weekly billings.
NOTIFICATIONS_SCREEN_NOTIFICATION_BODY: Here is a kindly reminder to add your billings for this week.
MY_DATA_SCREEN_BODY: With MyRizq.Nasional app you own your data. It means that we don't save your data on any server and therefore that no one but you can access it. No security problem, your data never leaves your phone. However, it also means that you are in charge of saving your data in case you loose your phone for example. To do so, use the export button below to get your data and save it where ever you want to. When you want to import old data, just press the import button but be careful because it will also delete your old data.
MY_DATA_SCREEN_ALERT_CONFIRM_IMPORT: This action will replace current data
MY_DATA_SCREEN_ALERT_CONFIRM_DELETE: This action will delete all your data
MY_DATA_SCREEN_DELETE_SUCCESSFUL: We have successully deleted your billings.
NO_EMISSION_COMPONENT_THANKS: Thanks for joining our fight against climate change!
